name: Water limbo
discri: A refreshing twist on the classic limbo game, where participants bend backward and try to pass under a horizontal bar while being sprayed with water. This activity is perfect for hot days, adding an extra layer of challenge and fun. It's a great way to cool off and enjoy some friendly competition at outdoor parties, picnics, and gatherings.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
